solution_line_template: The second competitor jumped one foot farther than the first competitor, for a distance of {first_competitor_jump}+{second_competitor_farther}=<<{first_competitor_jump}+{second_competitor_farther}={second_competitor_jump}>>{second_competitor_jump} feet.

The third competitor jumped two feet shorter than the third competitor, for a distance of {second_competitor_jump}-{third_competitor_shorter}=<<{second_competitor_jump}-{third_competitor_shorter}={third_competitor_jump}>>{third_competitor_jump} feet.

And the fourth competitor jumped 3 feet further than the third competitor, for a distance of {third_competitor_jump}+{fourth_competitor_further}=<<{third_competitor_jump}+{fourth_competitor_further}={fourth_competitor_jump}>>{fourth_competitor_jump} feet.
